event.title: remained as such for quite a number of years

data.event: It was a mere hamlet of the municipality of Guinanyagan, province of Quezon and remained as such for quite a number of years until it finally became a municipality.

event.title: now its official name which means

data.event: Buenavista is now its official name which means beautiful view.

event.title: was donated by one Don Jose Casal in the year 1866

data.event: Its original name was Piri as engraved in the oldest church bell which was donated by one Don Jose Casal in the year 1866.
